title: MH Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Signature Healthcare (MA) (Brockton, MA) in Jun 2021
Interview Descriptions: Asked a series of questions regarding experience, expectancies within the company and etc. They were really interested in my continuation with education so as mentioned previously, the more experience or knowledge you have the better.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in this field?

title: CT Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Signature Healthcare (MA) (Brockton, MA) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions:
The interview process was very easy 
If they give you an interview is because they already like you. I was shown around the department and everyone was very pleasant. The pace seems good. I had the opportunity to ask questions.
Interview Questions:
My willingness to work a certain amount of hours
Why I was interested in the position

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Interview Descriptions: HR was helpful and professional as was the manager I interviewed with. Pretty basic interview questions. Felt more like an easy going conversation rather than a normal stressful interview.  Overall good experience.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Pharmacy Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Signature Healthcare (MA) (Boston, MA) in Dec 2020
Interview Descriptions: 10 minutes call over the phone, describe the role, responsibilities and expectations. Then we talked about the process of selection for the position. They explained to me what I am supposed to do in order to be a good fit for the position
Interview Questions: Do you have an experience in this job?

title: Management Development and Training Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Signature Healthcare (MA) (Brockton, MA) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions:
Typical call in screening, and on-site interview with HR and leadership / hiring personnel. It went well and I felt the conversation was productive. However, after I sent follow up emails, attempted contacts and calls, I never heard back from them either way. This left me hanging on for weeks wondering what the position status was. I'm not concerned that I wasn't chosen, I've since locked down a good job, but it was the unprofessionalism of Signature Healthcare, the non-contact, blackout communication which I find unbecoming a quality organization. Simple human respect is not that hard.
I would not recommend Signature Healthcare in Brockton, MA
Interview Questions: Experience and ability to develop and implement training programs.

title: Physician Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Signature Healthcare (MA)
Interview Descriptions: Brockton made sure you had plenty of time to ask questions. They allow you to meet many members of the team. they made it very easy to understand what my role would be.

title: Clinical Care Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Signature Healthcare (MA) (Brockton, MA) in Dec 2016
Interview Descriptions: Very laid back, your asked basic questions. And then they tell you about the job pretty much. But it seems like if you don't know someone that's already working inside then you won't get the job.
Interview Questions: why did you choose those company/field?

title: Secretary Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Signature Healthcare (MA) (Brockton, MA)
Interview Descriptions: No, tricky questions, straight forward. If you get an interview, you already qualify they really just want to see your personality. Are you pleasant? Are you going to get along with others? Do you have a patient pleasing personality?

title: Medical Office Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Signature Healthcare (MA)

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Signature Healthcare (MA) (Brockton, MA) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: Interview was during dept. manager's lunch break.  Director did not talk very much.  Was primarily speaking to operations manager.  Took about an hour total.  Received an email before I got back home for my references.  Received a job offer about 2-3 weeks later.
Interview Questions: How do you deal with unruly or dramatic coworkers?

title: Project Management Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Signature Healthcare (MA) (Brockton, MA) in Mar 2012
Interview Descriptions: 1 hour long. Met with President and Vice President. Interview was not structured but was asked mainly about interest in the new position, relevant experience and some amount of behavioral interviewing. They explained the nature of the job which at that point was somewhat undefined.
Interview Questions: What are some of the communication techniques recommended in healthcare settings?

title: Radiology Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Signature Healthcare (MA) (Brockton, MA) in Jan 2012

title: Unit Coordinator ER Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Signature Healthcare (MA) (Brockton, MA) in Dec 2011
Interview Descriptions: Very brief, easy, just like a conversation, casual, asked me about prior work experience and why I wanted to work there. They discussed hospital privacy practices. I had to fill out a lot of paperwork.
Interview Questions: Are you good at multi tasking?
